text:
January 17, 1957
Mrs, Elaine Tucker, Manager
Statical KOKH (FM)
Oklahoma City Board of Education
18th and Kelin
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
Dear Elaine:
Are any reports available on TV course results over KETA-TV yet? Would
like, soon as available, for Fact Sheets,
Our best
HJStdfc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
